segments.text: I want to go back to my college on the Huanghe road.It is very close to your house .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is that the university next to the Teachers ' College ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You mean we'll share the taxi ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah.If we share the cab , it'll be cheaper.Besides that your Chinese is better than mine.The drivers usually have difficulty understanding me even though I practice my pronunciation carefully .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well.Don ' t worry about it , I will be happy to share the taxi with you .
segments.speaker: S2
